title: Hey guys, got something to tell ya
body:
I have had a cute grill who confessed to me today!

Which means....

I now have a GF!!

YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

replies.body: Just make sure she's not on when you kiss her.
Rip SEKAI is now taken, gg gonna go cry now that he can't be mine :(

Until someone actually checks the date of when this post was made,

Well I guess having a waifu isn't all that bad aye.

The most important question...

Will she play League with you?

if she starts to take you away from league.. run, run fast and far, league is your true women and you can't escape her even if you try {{summoner:2}} {{summoner:2}} {{summoner:2}}. league is that stalker girlfriend that never leaves you alone, you have to come back to her one day, mwahhahahahha
nice one friend. I am proud of you. I wish I could be your GF!! but it's too late for that and now i shall grab my things and move on. You will be missed my young darling SEKAI
